content.rendered:
Welcome to the all-new, WordPress-based blog!  All the old entries and comments are there and new ones will appear here.

Because I’m hosted at WordPress (at present) I’m limited in the designs (Themes) I can use.  This is my favourite – the others I like had teeny-tiny writing!

Feedback encouraged…especially if you think you can find me a more suitable photo for the header.

Thanks for reading folks!
